blogPost.title: At $190, DoorDash will be bigger than the combined market caps of Chipotle, Domino's, Shake Shack, and Papa John's.
blogPost.author: Michael Batnick

localize.full_text: DoorDash的售价为190美元，将超过Chipotle、Domino‘s、Shake Shack和Papa John’s的市值总和。
DoorDash的售價爲190美元，將超過Chipotle、Domino‘s、Shake Shack和Papa John’s的市值總和。
